summary.caption: “Honey, the Merrimonts are here. … They’d like to come down and see your ape-man project.”

summary.caption:
“Now, if you all would examine the chart, you will
notice that—well, well … seems Mr. Sparky has found

summary.caption: “For crying out loud! … You’re always hearing something moving around downstairs!”
